Our Mission:
- To bring a new change in the field of agriculture and create an easy-to-use, farmer-friendly application.
- Our app provides facilities for farmers to rent, sell, or purchase farm produce and equipment, helping improve their work. Renting agricultural machinery, buying seeds, or obtaining other agricultural products—our app offers a reliable solution for all your farming needs.

What We Do:
- Our app connects farmers and vendors, making it easier to rent or purchase agricultural machinery, seeds, and other agricultural products.
- We help farmers increase their productivity by supplying essential resources and provide vendors an opportunity to expand their business, supporting the local agricultural sector.

Our Vision:
- We envision a sustainable agricultural future where farmers can easily access the tools and knowledge they need.
- By providing essential resources through our app, we aim to promote growth, innovation, and efficiency in the agricultural sector.

Why Choose Us:
- Easy Access: A single platform for accessing agricultural machinery, seeds, and other farming products.
- Reliable Service: High-quality products and equipment from trustworthy vendors.
- User-Friendly Interface: A simple and intuitive experience tailored to farmers needs.
- Support for Local Agriculture: Empowering farmers to help grow local agricultural businesses.

1. Introduction
These Terms and Conditions govern your use of the SadhanSeva application. By accessing or using our app, you agree to comply with these terms. If you do not agree, please refrain from using the app.

2. Eligibility
Users must be 18 years or older to register and use the app.
You are responsible for providing accurate and complete information during registration.

3. Usage Guidelines
Users shall not misuse the app, including attempts to harm, exploit, or disrupt services.
Do not post illegal, abusive, or harmful content.

4. Service Limitation
SadhanSeva reserves the right to modify or discontinue services without prior notice.
The app is provided on an "as-is" basis without warranties of any kind.

5. Payments and Transactions
All payments made through the app are subject to our payment processor\'s terms.
Users are responsible for ensuring the accuracy of payment details.

6. Liability
SadhanSeva shall not be liable for any damages arising from the use of the app.
Users interact with other users (vendors or farmers) at their own discretion and responsibility.

1.Data Collection
We collect user data such as names, email addresses, location, and payment details to provide app functionality.
Data is collected during registration, transactions, and app usage.

2.Data Usage
Your data is used to process transactions, improve the app, and provide personalized recommendations.
We do not sell or share your data with third parties without consent, except as required by law.

3.Data Security
We implement measures to protect your personal information. However, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure.

4.User Rights
Users can request access to, correction of, or deletion of their personal data.
Requests can be submitted through the Contact Us section in the app.

5.Third-Party Services
The app may use third-party services like payment gateways or analytics tools. These services have their own privacy policies.
I have read and fully understand the Terms and Conditions, and I agree to abide by them to continue using this application.
How Was Your Experience? : Very Good
